definition: to exert a force on a body causing it to approach or prevent it from moving away
details:
verb
- to exert a force on a body causing it to approach or prevent it from moving away
= example: to exert a force on a body causing it to approach or prevent it from moving away
- to direct toward itself or oneself by means of some psychological power or physical attributes
= example: to direct toward itself or oneself by means of some psychological power or physical attributes
= synonyms: pull in
- to be attractive to or cause a sexual or romantic interest
= example: to be attractive to or cause a sexual or romantic interest
= synonyms: appeal
